articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Scientists get closer to solving mystery of antimatter - BBC
articles.description: The elusive substance holds the key to discovering how the Universe was formed.
articles.content:
Scientists have made a key discovery about antimatter - a mysterious substance which was plentiful when the Universe began.
Antimatter is the opposite of matter, from which stars and planets are mad… [+4562 chars]
